message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a fair price given its value to you.  Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, but I'm not willing to pay $11,000. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $9,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, though. How about $10,500?  This is a fair price considering the value of the product and my own bottom line. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,800 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
